p: No fully effective vaccine has yet been developed for these diseases 87, 88 but such work is in progress. 89, 90 Recent trends are worrying, with outbreaks of dengue reported in the United States, 91 Madeira in 2012, 92 autochthonous transmission of both dengue and chikungunya reported in southern France in 2010 and 2014, 93, 94 local dengue transmission in Croatia in 2010, 95 the largest dengue outbreak reported in China in 2014, 96 and the first local dengue case reported in Japan in over 70 years in 2014. 97 Chikungunya is also on the rise, with an outbreak reported in Italy in 2007 98 and 2017, the first local transmission of this disease in the United States in 2014, 99 and recent epidemics in the Caribbean, and Central and South American regions. 100
